body: Just curious literally so many people are leaving and i really am not sure why? I have seen so many people leave recently and soon ill be in ts with newbies ive never heard of....

title: Not Leaving..

replies.body: ive seen a good handful of people who have 'left' online playing public
replies.body_tagged: ive seen a good handful of people who have 'left' online playing public

replies.body: cos of the new update. It happened with Omega, it will happen and is happening now.
replies.body_tagged: cos of the new update. It happened with Omega, it will happen and is happening now.

replies.body:
I don't really get the point of some of the leaving threads. Most of them I've read are "I don't like this update, goodbye." 
I can guess that those sort of threads are created by people who are going to come back.

On a total other side note, am I the only one that feels that leaving posts serve no purpose? If you were actually going to leave, why make a thread that just creates attention towards yourself?
